modName: New Ancient Nord Armor for CBBE
summary:
This mod turn the ancient nord armor into light armor and add a totally new heavy version.
Work with the new Pushup Body 3.0
descriptionHtml:
[IMG]http://img687.imageshack.us/img687/2282/descriptionw.png[/IMG]

[b]Hi and welcome on my mod. This mod turn the heavy ancient nord armor into light and add a totally new heavy version. The heavy armor has to be crafted at forge under \"Superior Armor tab\" and require a light one.

[color=pink]Be carefull, this armor works better with the default CBBE texture. If you use custom textures or normals, you can meet textures bugs. To work good just copy your body texture into Data\\Textures\\armor\\draugr and rename femalebody_1.dss into femalebody_2.dss [/b][/color]

[IMG]http://img255.imageshack.us/img255/2514/aword.png[/IMG]

The Pushup body called also ( CBBEPU ) is a modified body from Caliente made by me. It \"equip\" the most of my clothing mods to give a more natural effect with the tight clothes. [color=red]That why all my mods are uncompatible with other type of body [/color]. This body works perfectly with all the CBBE original bodies. See my others mods to see more examples. It doesn\'t replace anything.

[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img543/5889/pushupd.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://img404.imageshack.us/img404/8249/udpate.png[/IMG]

[b][color=orange] version 1.1 (currently version)[/color][/b] 

Version 1.1

 - Add Stand alone Version ! Just add the new armor to the game.  It has to be craft at forge.
 - Add panty to the regular ancient Nord armor.
 - Add a fist person view that fixed a glitch with the regular nord armor.
 - Fixed the unenchantable heavy gauntlets.

Version 1.0     

[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img543/728/screenshot444n.jpg[/IMG]

- Make sure tu use the lastest update or the desired version.
- Make sure you have the lighe \'\'bEnableFileSelection=1\'\' in SkyrimPrefs.ini under [Launcher].
- Make sure \"Ancientnord.eps\" is checked in Data Files in the Skyrim launcher or in Nexus mod Manager.
- If you update, copy files into data directory and click Ok to overwrite files.

If it you first mod you have to add that line in SkyrimPrefs.ini located in My document/MyGames/Skyrim or something. Add the line in bold in [Launcher] section like this :
 
[Launcher]
bEnableFileSelection=1

To uninstall:
1. Start Skyrim launcher, click Data Files, .esp.
2. Delete the files/folders associated with the mod.

[IMG]http://img407.imageshack.us/img407/1424/recomm.png[/IMG]

- [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666][color=orange]Calientes Female Body â€“CBBE by Caliente [/color][/URL]

[IMG]http://img831.imageshack.us/img831/2119/bugsyl.png[/IMG]

Not reperted yet.

[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img19/7303/screenshot222x.jpg[/IMG]

This mod would not have been possible without the work of this modders.

*KURESE for the lingerie meshes and textures(free to use).
*Caliente for Caliente\'s Body Mod - Big Bottom Edition v3.


 *If I forgot anyone, it was unintentional. Report it to me so I add you to credits.

No russian translation or permission will be given. My files has been stolen by russians without asking me permission. Sorry for honnest russian players.

[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img12/5576/licencing2.jpg[/IMG]


[IMG]http://img42.imageshack.us/img42/7055/videoseg.png[/IMG]

Soon...
author: Nikitaa

files.changelogHtml:
Add Stand alone Version ! Just add the new armor to the game. It has to be craft at forge.
Add panty to the regular ancient Nord armor.
Add a fist person view that fixed a glitch with the regular nord armor.
Fixed the unenchantable heavy gauntlets.
